meanings.definition: A four-sided plane figure with opposite sides of equal length and four right angles.
meanings.sent1: I drew a rectangle on my paper during art class.
meanings.sent2: The bookshelf was made of sturdy rectangles of wood.
meanings.sent3: The rectangle on the wall looked like a window to another world.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes widened as she saw the rectangle of light under the door.
meanings.sent5: The rectangle of sunlight on the floor was warm and inviting.

meanings.definition: An object or shape with four straight sides and four right angles, especially one with unequal adjacent sides.
meanings.sent1: The garden had a rectangular pond in the center.
meanings.sent2: She wrapped the gift in a rectangle of shiny paper.
meanings.sent3: The rectangle of cake on his plate was bigger than expected.
meanings.sent4: The rectangle of land was perfect for building a house.
meanings.sent5: The rectangle of shadow cast by the tree stretched across the yard.
